docs.snippet: The maker of the Swiss chocolate has shrunk and reconfigured two milk-chocolate versions, with narrower triangles and a wider gap between peaks.

headline.print_headline: Customers Aghast as Toblerone Changes Bars’ Shape
headline.main: Toblerone Alters Shape of 2 Chocolate Bars, and Fans Are Outraged

docs.snippet: The U.S. Secret Service is pursuing an aggressive outreach strategy on Twitter, Facebook and YouTube to give the public a taste of life inside the elite agency.

headline.print_headline: Social Media Blitz: Secret Service Aims to Improve Its Image
headline.main: Social Media Blitz: Secret Service Aims to Improve Its Image

docs.snippet: A Michigan steakhouse got more sizzle than it bargained for out of a college football promotion.

headline.print_headline: High-Steak Game: 78-Point Win Means Big Restaurant Discount
headline.main: High-Steak Game: 78-Point Win Means Big Restaurant Discount

docs.snippet: A New Hampshire wedding got a dose of unexpected drama when the groom's mother went missing for several hours.

headline.print_headline: Groom's Mother Goes for a Walk, Gets Lost, Delaying Wedding
headline.main: Groom's Mother Goes for a Walk, Gets Lost, Delaying Wedding

docs.snippet: You can still watch the final televised presidential debate Wednesday even if you don't have a TV.

docs.snippet: Police in Massachusetts say they plan to charge a father who wore a scary clown mask and followed his child's school bus.

headline.print_headline: Cops Plan to Charge Dad in Scary Clown Mask Who Followed Bus
headline.main: Cops Plan to Charge Dad in Scary Clown Mask Who Followed Bus

docs.snippet: This classic musical, directed by Bartlett Sher, is timely and shines on all fronts. It closes on New Year’s Eve.

headline.main: ‘Fiddler on the Roof’ Revival Has Its Final Notes

docs.snippet: Moat awards different scores depending on whether an advertisement’s audio is on or how much of it streams, a seeming leap forward in a confounding realm of analytics.

headline.print_headline: New Tool Aims to Parse Value of Online Ad Views
headline.main: New Tool Aims to Parse the Value of Online Ad Viewing

docs.snippet: Angry fans of singer Gerardo Ortiz took their exasperation out on his set when he failed to show at a concert in Philadelphia.

headline.print_headline: Fans Trash Gerardo Ortiz's Set After Singer a No-Show
